description: CrateDB cluster monitoring, including application-specific and general host-level metrics

options.content: Welcome to this CrateDB monitoring dashboard! The dashboard covers essential CrateDB and operating system metrics to help you getting started. To learn more about setting up a full monitoring stack based on Prometheus and Grafana, please [refer to our tutorial](https://community.crate.io/t/monitoring-an-on-premises-cratedb-cluster-with-prometheus-and-grafana/1236).

panels.title: Average Query Duration (over the last 1 min)

title: CrateDB Monitoring
